I planned a whole program around this book. Numbers, colors, days of the week - what's not to love?
Very good feedback from my daughter and her husband
I love it
I searched a long time for a book I thought my 1 1/2 year old would like. This was perfect. He loves it!
Good
I like how pages are very sturdy. It brought back memories from my childhood.
Great classic!Wonderful storyline! Great to focus on math concepts such a 1:1 correspondence and time too . Always a good choice!
My daughter favorite book love it high quality

This book is one of my childrens' favorites. From the time they were both too little to know their days of the week they still chimed in when the caterpillar ate and ate and was "Still Hungry" until they could say the days of the week with no problem, this book will forever be a staple among my families' collections. The illustrations are Eric Carle's usual terrific array of colors and creatures. This book is also great for nursery school teachers to read and explain to their children the beautiful transformation from caterpillar to butterfly by using live caterpillars as an educational tool.
Absolutely love the book and toy!

I knew a miniature edition would be smaller than a standard picture book, but I wasn't expecting it to be as tiny as it was/is.

This product is smaller than my phone (Samsung Gallaxy 2) or could be compared to the size of a man's wallet.
To me this is too small to trully appreciate the wonderful art and story of the book. It is difficult to read to myself at this size, imagine trying to share it with kids.

Doesn't meet my needs or exceptions.
So be warned, miniature edition really does mean MINIATURE, almost miniscule edition.

I love reading this book to my baby. There is more than one lesson to be learned in the story, and the illustrations are beautiful. It's also sturdy. I previously purchased a hard cover minibook by accident (I thought it was the board book) and it was flimsy and too small to really get the full effect. The board book is good for all ages.

This is the quintessential Eric Carle book. The illustrations are lovely, the story simple but engaging, and a "surprise" at the end. My children and I loved this little board book and read it over and over. It is on my list of books to make sure I have for my grandkids (many years down the road). I also recommend Brown Bear, Brown Bear and Polar Bear, Polar Bear, although you almost can't go wrong with a Carle book for kids.
Perfect!
Love this board book!!
The back cover was very bent when taken out of the box.
Great book!

The Very Hungry Catepillar is a classic, but timely story that still entertains while teaching several lessons. It can be used to show the scientific process of a butterfly's development in a matter that very young kids can understand; teach the days of the week; teach sequence of events; used in churches to show steps of salvation--how we become new creatures in Christ. Children and adults love this well-written tale.
♡
Excellent
Great quality!
I used this book for my child care business
titles: That it is a board book and great for toddlers.

review_contents: Love it!!

My daughter loved this book when she was younger and now that she has a daughter of her own, I purchased it so she can share her favorite story with my granddaughter! I was a little disappointed in the size... I didn't realize the book would be so small, I'm used to seeing the regular sized ones you see everywhere - but it's my mistake because I shouldn't have guessed that all of these books came in one size, this is why I never even looked at the details of the book dimensions. All in all though, the book is loved by all and still a good purchase!
titles: A classic book! Was my daughter's favorite, now my granddaughter's!

review_contents: A book for all children PreK -2nd grade. Funny and informative. Follows the transition from a caterpillar to a beautiful butterfly.

My children love this story! This book explains the life cycle of the butterfly and introduces children to the days of the week, the names of fruits, and numbers as the caterpillar eats through different foods each day --two pears on Tuesday, three plums on Wednesday, etc.-- until he finally weaves his cocoon and emerges as a beautiful butterfly.We enjoy reading his books again and again and the story was easy to remember. Beautiful illustrations and great story. Yet there are some mistakes like on the "Saturday" page according to the text, the caterpillar ate through "one slice of salami", yet the picture shows that he eats through the entire salami, the butterfly he turns into has its wings upside-down and the butterflies comes from chrysalis not cocoons.The reason I rated this book a 5 stars is because this is a beautiful,educational,imaginative and fun book for little kids. I highly recommend this book for younger children.
titles: Great story book for little ones!

review_contents: We love the story.
Happy boy with his favorite book.

A favorite book for me and baby. This board book is heavy duty and my kid loves to chew on it and drool on it when we aren't reading together (and sometimes when we are). The illustrations are amazing and are very colorful and high contrast to help keep babies attention.

I am not sure if this is how the paper book is, but the board book has little tiny pages once the caterpillar starts eating and then each page gets bigger as the caterpillar eats more.

I highly recommend this book for babies. It is fun to read and the kids enjoy listening.
Classic
Love this children’s book!

This was one of my favorites as a child. It's a classic for good reason so I am sharing it with my children. It's a simple but neat story and provides opportunities for learning a variety of things such as days of the week and the caterpillar's transformation to a butterfly. I've been reading this to my son since he was 1 year old and even at that age he enjoyed flipping through the pages and peeping through the little holes while looking at all the colorful pictures as I read it to him.

This was one of my favorite books as a child and has quickly become a favorite for my children. This copy was purchased for my cousin's baby shower and as a teacher she was beyond thrilled to receive it! The book was a little smaller in size than I realized it would be when I initially ordered it, but it's actually the perfect size for little kid hands. This will probably become a tradition for me to buy as a baby shower gift from now on. I also love that this is a board book so it's safe even for toddlers that are determined to destroy everything in their path.

I thought I was being very mindful of which size book was being purchased. However, like many others, I mistakenly ended up with the mini. Sending back. And in all honesty, I really can't figure out who would want the mini as it's half the size of a dollar bill.
titles: Be Very Mindful of Book Description

review_contents: One of my daughters favorite books!
My daughter loves this classic.
Book is in perfect condition, beautiful illustrations. Gave it 3 stars because it was the mini version of the original.
titles: Book is in perfect condition, beautiful illustrations

review_contents: I loved this book as a child and thought my son would like it too. He loves the pictures and reading the story. We have read it at least once a day (sometimes many more) since we got it on Christmas. He just turned three so he can't quite read yet but he has memorized some of the book and loves to "read" along.
Great book, my son loves it
A classic book I had to have. Feel like a kid again flipping through the pages; can’t wait to read it to my kids someday.
thank you for the book
good

I purchased the board book version, and am very glad I did. The book is very sturdy, and I think it will last a long time. The illustrations are cute, and the book has a very interesting design on its inner pages which I wasn't expecting. I think little children will enjoy this book because it's presented in a unique, fun way, rather than the standard pages of pictures that other books contain.
Quick delivery quality products
Nice

This book is a must-have for any child's book collection. I saw that it was a mini book but did not pay close attention to the dimensions- it really is very small. It's about the size of my hand. The illustrations are beautiful, the page cutouts are the same, and the text is all there. This may be a good copy to keep in your car/purse/diaper bag. I can see it coming in handy in that way. That said, I'll probably end up buying the full-size version separately.
titles: A classic. A very small classic!

review_contents:
My favorite book as a child! Mine was much larger.... This one was smaller than expected but the story was the same. Smile.

Images and words throughout book are as bold and colorful as they are on the cover! Included a photo with other books to give an idea of size.

Great value for a nice quality and well laid out book. My 3 yr old nephew and 4 yr old granddaughter both enjoyed the story with wide eyes.

Perfect for younger children! Buy with confidence. Smile. Hope this helps
titles: Smaller Than Expected But Beautiful Still..........

review_contents:
This was a favorite when I was a kid, and 25 years later, my sons loves it too. My two year old son can nearly recite the entire book by heart and loves pretending to eat the food alongside the caterpillar. We have both the hard back and paper back editions, and although the later has larger pictures, I recommend getting the hard back as it wears better.

Definitely recommended!
Bought for my grandson. My kids loved it, so I know he will too.
titles: My kids loved it, so I know he will too

review_contents:
I wish I had purchased this book before now. We love Eric Carle books and have many of them but this one has helped my 3.5 year old learn the days of the week. How great it that! He is also learning based sight words at this stage and this books has a lot of good words that he knows, so he tries to read it to us himself.
What they will learn from the book: Days of the week, numbers, food items, what a caterpillar turns into.

A must have in your collection and great as a gift!
titles: A must have in your collection and great as a gift!

review_contents: We all know and love this classic book. Of course we want to read it to our wee ones. But if you're going to be reading it to a baby still going through the "Super Interactive Reading" phase that involves smacking the book, please do yourself a favor and get the board book. At some point your lovely hardcover (or worse, paperback) will get ripped and that will be sad. No concerns with the board book!
titles: If introducing this book to a baby, make sure to get the board book

review_contents: Adorable
Simple, & delightful!
LOVE THIS BOOK

Great book! It is a cute classic story that I remember reading as a child, and now I am reading it to my daughter. She loves the colors in the book and it is a short story that we have been reading again and again. I like how the book itself is put together (it is a board book and there are some pages in the middle that are intentionally partial pages) and I expect it to last us a very long time.

I would definitely recommend this book!
Size is really small; be aware.

Classic. My son started to say the Chinese word of caterpillar soon after I read the book in Chinese to him. He just turned 20 months and wants to pick his favorite books before bed time, and this is always a winner. The format of the book appeals to young children naturally; colors, cut-out holes, simple story line with counting games. Every parent should get a copy of this.
A Classic! AAA+++

i will admit that the book is smaller then i thought it was going to be. For some reason i thought it was going to be a HUGE board book but it wasnt. it was slightly smaller then the size of the paper back, but a lot bigger then the mini- version. Got it new because i'm having my first baby in July and i wanted to make sure its something i'd feel comfortable with him putting in his mouth. For some reason i couldnt do that with an older book- even if it was in good condition.
Perfect condition!
Love it!

Personally I don't get what the big deal is, but kids love this book. My daughter got this book from a family friend for her 1st birthday. It instantly became her favorite book. We would have to read it over and over again. Over the two years between her birthday and her younger brother becoming interested in books, this book was shot (the binding finally came apart). We got another one to replace it because my son also wants this book read to him every time you turn around. We have since purchased this book many times over for different friends and family gift occasions, and their kids all love it too!
A Christmas gift for my son
Gift

Note that this is a miniature edition. I did not notice this when purchasing so, I was a bit surprised when I received this book and it fit into the palm of my hand.

Despite its tiny size, the story, illustrations and quality are the exact same as the larger print edition. So, if you're looking for a tiny book to throw in the diaper bag, this is the perfect size! It is a hard cover edition, too so, the pages won't get bent up if it's jostled around in a bag.
Classic! Can’t go wrong.
I didn't expect it to be so small. I would have made it one star but it's entirely my fault for not checking the dimensions.
titles: I didn't expect it to be so small. I ...

review_contents: A classic!
Classic book for all children
JUST THE BEST!!
titles: A classic must-have for any kid

review_contents: Wonderful story, a must for any child!
Great book

This miniature edition of Eric Carle's classic "The Very Hungry Caterpillar," is just the right size for small hands. My three-year old grandson loves to hold this cute, little book as he "reads" it to himself. The cutouts on each page enchant the young reader, and the surprise ending delights that same young reader.

Youngsters will read and re-read this book.
Safe for babies to chew on!My daughter loves the book and visuals
My Grandsons love seeing the book come to life!

We first feel in love with the regular hard cover version of this classic. The story has bright colors, fun sensory holes for tiny fingers to explore, simple plot lesson on metamorpheses, counting, days of the week, nutrition moral and food identification. It's been a family favorite. I wanted to give some new moms this book as a gift (with cute stuffed caterpillars I found at Dollar Tree). I knew I'd find the best deal for the book on Amazon.com, so I took a risk ordering this smaller copy. It is small (slightly bigger than a dollar bill), but perfectly appropriate for the baby/toddler audience! It can become that special book that travels to the car, pack n play or fits in your purse for an errand. This is a satisfying purchase for my gift.
titles: Board Book Version Rocks for Toddlers

review_contents: Classic Children’s book needed for every child’s library.

When I recieved this book in the mail I was a bit disappointed on how small it was, I was expecting it to be bigger, upon arrival all I could think was "thats it" really small but none the less I still love this book and cannot wait to read it to my son throughout the years when he finally arrives because I know he will enjoy it as much as I did when I was a child.
titles: Book is smaller then what I thought I was paying for

review_contents: I was concerned when I read the reviews commenting that this book was too small- but it is a perfect board book, 5x7 size- and honestly I've seen larger versions where the purposefully smaller inside pages seemed lost and disproportionate- anyway I find it to be the perfect size and just a delightful book worthy of all it's praise. Very pleased!

My fault that I didn't read the description too well. This book is small. Really small. But it still holds the same,lovable story I grew up with. So when I saw the book and the price, I decided to buy it. My daughter loves this book. She brings it everywhere when we leave the house. I would have to say the size is great for travelling. But if you can, pick up the bigger version. This book is great nonetheless and I don't regret my purchase!

Excellent book for children!! This book is great for counting, colors, etc. It will keep your toddler's attention and provide lots of fun opportunities for sharing. The ending, when the caterpillar becomes a butterfly, is wonderful for talking about how we all start out little and grow into the wonderful person we can be. What a fantastic book!

It is hard to know what to say that hasn't been said before about a classic like this. Beautiful illustrations in a fun layout that still entertains adults while making little ones want to turn each page to see what that caterpillar might have eaten next -- and all the while they are learning how to count! Brilliant!! This is a gift choice that I always return to when one of my friend's babies becomes a toddler! I'd recommend this as a gift for children age 2 through 4 (but it is a classic, so you may want to get it earlier or check with the mom or dad to see if they already have it!)

My son got this from me for Christmas when he was one and a half, he's turning two on Monday and its one of his favorite books. This book is still intact when most others show significant wear from my tot! There is a movie story too so if you play it your kids can follow in the book its so great he's learning to count and knows what some foods are he's never eaten :)#

This is such a cute book, perfect for small hands and easy to tuck inside your purse or your diaper bag. I love Eric Carle's children's books anyway and having it available in this size is so convenient. I included one with a gift for a baby shower instead of the usual card. The cost is nearly the same and you get a book to last through a childhood instead of an expensive piece of trash that will be thrown away immediately.

Maybe it's my fault or maybe they didn't post the size at the time, but this came in a very small format. This is a childhood classic that my mom read to us when we were growing up. I was excited to receive this bad boy in the mail but when I did to my surprise it was no more than pocket size. So be sure to check the size of the book before purchase. Other than that I would give it a 5 star for the book. I read it to my daughter and she loves it... if only the book was bigger but oh well.
titles: Great sentimental book. Check size of book before purchase

review_contents: I remember loving this book as a child, and now I have it to share with my child. The illustrations are bright and colorful. The text teaches about the days of the week, numbers, and the scientific process of metamorphosis. The pages are fun to turn, and the story is surprising and enjoyable. If your child does not have this book, you should get it for him or her.

This is a wonderful tactile book for young readers, 6 mos and up. Our son is gradually getting into more complex books but he loved this one until he was around 2 yrs old. This is actually the first book he started reading out loud. He loved naming all the food items and sticking his finger into the holes and seeing the caterpillar turn into the colorful butterfly. The art inspires creativity and imagination. Definitely recommend for any child as their first book!
titles: Inspires creativity and a child's imagination

review_contents: I purchased this product for my grandbaby. He immediately was drawn to all of the different things that can be done with this toy. It is brightly colored and had different feels to different parts. I purchased this with 3 other toys, and he seemed to be drawn to this the most. It's a little big to take out to dinner, but it's super cute to have at home.
My son loves this book!!!
titles: Wants to read it every night

review_contents: Loved all three of them ! Great price

I thought this was the big board book when I bought it... So sad it was normal small sized. The kids still love it, but I thought I was ordering the bigger, full-page-size I had seen other places. The kids still love this book the very best of all the Eric Carle books. And its held up quite well the last few years despite our rough kids!

This is my husband's favorite book from when he was a child so I wanted to get it for our son too. My son is 18 months and really likes this book. He seems to really love when I read, point out, and count the foods the caterpillar has eaten. My only issue is that it's a little short so we end up reading another one after we read this one.

I was using this as a guestbook for a baby shower, and I needed the 8.5 x 12" version. It was VERY difficult to find exactly which one I was looking for, because most listings do not have product dimensions listed. This is the right size book if you're looking for the larger, original version! The guestbook was a hit and the mom-to-be loves that she can have those memories in her baby's first book.
titles: Baby Shower Guestbook -- Trouble finding right size!

review_contents:
I purchased this book for my niece. I am in the process of building her an awesome first library. I thought I should purchase this classic children's book.When I received this I was so disappointed in the size! The best part of the book is to be able to poke your fingers through the wholes provided…no kid can do that with this miniature version.

I should have read the full dimensions.
titles: I am in the process of building her an awesome first library

review_contents: You can't go wrong with Eric Carle. The Hungry Caterpillar teaches so many great lessons. Biology with the caterpillar making a cocoon and turning into a butterfly. Counting, colors, and days of the week. The bright pictures are great for learning colors. I was pleased to see that this larger version also has holes in the food like our old board board did. My toddler loves this book. It is one of his favorites.

this is a really cute board book. It doesn't have a big hole at the back as I expected but an increasing number of small holes. I was going to return it because the intended recipient, as it turns out, already has the book. However, this was the best buy including shipping. But by the time I deduct shipping both ways, it's not worth returning it. I plan to keep it and maybe find another child who needs a book next Christmas.
titles: a good buy including shipping but not financially worth returning

review_contents: A very cute and colorful book that is a classic. We used this book as the center piece of a book baby shower that we gave for my niece since this was one of her favorite childhood books. The cake consisted of cupcakes that imitated the colors and shape of the caterpillar on the cover. It was a big hit with both my niece and the guests.
titles: Great book, great baby shower theme.

review_contents: Wow when it says miniature edition it means miniature.... Great book though, I remember it from when I was a child. Just wish I would of purchased the bigger sized book. {which I probably will} Size is why only 3 stars. Im sure when I purchase the larger size book I will definetly rate it 5 stars...

I probably should've actually paid attention to the dimensions of the board book. I saw other reviews saying the book was "mini" but I thought I had avoided that by purchasing the board book. Not so. It still fits my needs, perhaps more so because the small size is perfect for little hands, but mommy and daddy do have to squint a bit to get through bedtime readings. Besides that, this is a great book and we love it, just wish it was a bit bigger.
titles: perhaps more so because the small size is perfect for little hands

review_contents: This little classic was a joy to read to my son, who marveled at the colors and laughed when he noticed the wholes in the book. Now I just need to buy the plushy caterpillar for him so that when we finish the book he can see the caterpillar responsible for eating the book. A must have for any child and parent.

Cute story line and well illustrated. Book size is small, 5 1/2 X 3 1/2", easy for little hands to hold but print is very small. Inspite of it's size, it's still a very good book for little people. It arrived within alloted time frame and was well packaged. Makes a good edition for my kids books collection at my house. Good buy from Amazon. Ellen P.

Perfect book for on the go parents. This book size can easily fit into any small purse or backpack. The book it's self is a classic, I grew up on this and it bought back plenty of memories for me being read ( full size version ) in kindergarten. I highky recommend this book, how ever this is considerably smaller than I thought it would be. None the less this is a wonderful children's book.
titles: Perfect book for on the go parents

review_contents: Loved it when I was a kid, and now so do my kids. Girls 2 & 3 years (bought this over a year ago) always love this book. They know the words by heart and love turning the food pages. If you don't have it yet, get it for your little ones!
This is a favorite of mine. We did a puppet show and the kids had a blast. They never get tired to listening to it and hearing about all the foods the caterpillar ate.

I bought this book because my autistic grandson is crazy about the movie. The book generated excitement and he turned each page and "read" the words because he had memorized it from watching it so many times. He ticks off all the foods the caterpillar ate on Saturday with no problem, while I have trouble remembering them.

If you're attending a baby shower that has a "contribution" feature (i.e. "Help Build Baby's Library") and you don't want to spend MORE money than you already have on the baby shower, then this item is a great choice. It is a popular book by a well-known children's book author and it is priced very well. Just be aware of its dimension because it definitely is, as its product name states, a miniature edition.
titles: If you don't want to spend more money but the shower's got a "Help Build Baby's Library" scheme, errr portion

review_contents: Our 10-month son loves this book (and has loved it for the past nine months). It's great because the pages are sturdy so even when he puts them in his mouth, he can't tear them. The pictures are bright and colorful, and our son loves "interacting" with the book by putting his fingers in the food and leaf holes. A must have for reading with young kids!
titles: Our 10-month son loves this book (and has loved it for the past nine months)

review_contents: I used to read this book as a child and loved it. So it is easy to see why I would want to by this for my 3 year old! This has to be one of his favorite books and wants to read it with me several times a day. It is very sturdy and just as I remembered. I would recommend this for anyone that wants a fun book to read with!
It a wonderful book to share with toddlers. My children loved it as a child and all of nephews and nieces love it. I brought this one for 1st grandchild.
It was my son's favorite book. We read it all the time when he was younger!

I was imagining something small, but this is smaller than that even. It's not awful and it is probably the only unabridged version available in hardback on Amazon, but there are definitely better options. I would recommend the combo pack with the caterpillar in it. It's about the same size, but it comes with the actual caterpillar. Bright side, it is good for little hands.
titles: Really small, but maybe you're looking for that

review_contents: Hungry caterpillar is great for 3-5 yr olds. Youngest to Older: Goodnight Moon, then Guess How Much I Love You, then Very Hungry Caterpillar. They are then ready for Suess.
titles: As good as they get for little ones

review_contents: My 16 month old son LOVES this book! He turns the pages and loves putting his fingers in the holes where the catepillar has been. I would recommend this for any toddler. We read it almost daily and he never tires of it. The simple pictures are perfect for his attention span without being too overwhelming to look at.

Both of my daughters loved this book. I got it for my little grandson, and it's his favorite book. My daughter even had it as the theme for his 1st birthday party - cutouts of all of the ingredients in the story hung from fishing line around the house. She even had fondant figures for the cake. Wonderful memories all around my family.

This board book is just so cute. The story is one that I remember reading as a child and my 2 year old loves it too. I love the way that you can use this book to reinforce color recognition, counting, fruit recognition and even introduce new words like cocoon (my daughter's new favorite word! lol). Great book.

I love this story - I remember it from when I was a kid and I am looking forward to reading it to my son and to my nephew. It's such a great, wholesome story.

The only problem I have with this paperbook book is that the pages inside the book are thin. They would be easy for a baby or toddler to bend or tear out in only 30 seconds.
titles: A Great Book to Share for Generations!

review_contents: my 3.5 month has loved this book for a long time. this is one of maybe 3 books she'll actually sit and listen to. she gets so excited when the numbers are read, it makes us so happy!

love the story, the colors, and the book itself, i red some comments that it was a small book, my daughter its 2 years and the book its just the normal perfect size for a child that age, this is the book she always grab first it really gets her attention, and well she has plenty of other books but this one its always her fist option, its definitely our new favorite book!
Perfect!
Our favorite bedtime story!
My son love this book.

I purchased this for my grandson.
My kids loved this book when they were little, and this was one of my daughter wanted me to get for him.
He's just a baby no, but I'm sure he will have the book for a long time.
It is very well constructed and heavy duty.
Excellent quality.
Received well!

Books? You can't go wrong reading to your children. It's a fun book that I read to my little one over and over. I took a chance on how it said you can feel different things in it but all it is is a bunch of holes in some sections of the book. Get "Pat the Bunny" if you want a touchy feely book too.

This little mini book is exactly what I was looking for. We used it as decoration at my son's first birthday party so that people could read the story. We had other copies of the book out as well, and we had a board book that our guests were able to sign and leave a birthday note for our son. This mini book is exactly what I wanted.
This is one of my 18 month old's favorite books at the moment. We have a growing library of board books, but this one really stands out amongst the rest thanks to its unique format and presentation.
titles: This is one of my 18 month old's favorite books at the moment

review_contents: I love THE VERY HUNGRY CATERPILLAR. I've purchased two of these books as gifts for my great grandsons. Can't start reading to those babies too early. Also, I made a reversible quilt with the BROWN BEAR, BROWN BEAR, WHAT TO YOU SEE? print on one side and THE VERY HUNGRY CATERPILLAR print panel on the opposite side--had to have the books to go with the quilt.
titles: I love THE VERY HUNGRY CATERPILLAR

review_contents: I used this mini version of the famous book on a plane trip with my 18 mo old, he was happy, I was happy, people around us were happy.
titles: Nice miniature copy, good for plane trips.

review_contents: It's a very creative book for young toddlers and I enjoy watching my son imitate the caterpillar in the book to crawl on floor and he repeats "crawl, crawl, crawl"! That's so cute and funny! He learned the word "butterfly" and lots of different type of food from this book.

I adored this story as a child so I'm buying copies for all of the children (nieces, nephews, friends' kids, etc) in my life as they get older. I just bought for for my niece for this Christmas. The book arrived promptly and in excellent condition. I can't recommend this enough, love this book!

I got this book for my kids, as they are in a huge book stage. I got the board book because they are ages 3 and 1, so I thought it would last longer! They LOVE the book! I get requested to read it multiple times a day! It is perfect for my 3 year old to go alone with and count with!

My two year old grandson likes this book a lot. His Daddy, who owned the original, found the small size and the coloration of the illustrations disappointing. Since the original is not available this is the next best thing and the board book format is good for little hands.
titles: My two year old Grandson likes this book.

review_contents: I got this book for my son's 1st birthday coming up. I've always loved it and decided to make his party theme The Very Hungry Caterpillar! I'm going to use this for people to sign so it will be a forever keepsake. The book was in perfect condition other than a scratch on the front, but I'm not complaining! I couldn't find this in soft cover anywhere in stores! So happy to find it on Amazon!!!!

Took my son, 11 months at the time, about two weeks to rip the cover off. For whatever reason he bends the front cover of all his books back, I think its because my wife has a kindle and the cover bends back so he is imitating that. We enjoyed the book but once he started to rip it apart it was time to throw it away.

A classic story, I however missed the part about it being super miniature. Book is really tiny. Way to small to work the way it should. May work for an older child to ready by themselves, but is too small for me to read to my child.
My children and I love reading this book together!

My 2-yr-old absolutely LOVES this book. It is great for counting, but he just loves the story. We can't just read it once. We MUST read it at least 4 times at every sitting. Cute illustrations. The book arrived just a couple of days after I ordered it--days ahead of schedule--in perfect condition. I would order from this seller again.. .
titles: Great story. Awesome art. A real keeper

review_contents: There's not much I need to say about this classic. The story is great for kids...except that this book is extremely small. Too small. The text is tiny inside a small book too. I don't recommend getting this, go with the normal size version.
titles: Great book...but it's really really small

review_contents: One of my favorites to read to my baby. I find the wording easy to make expressive & add vocal inflections to keep my baby's attention. This book will, eventually, be great for teaching counting, life cycle of butterfly, and days of the week. For now, my son is just enjoying mommy's voice and the vivid colors.

This book is awesome for younger children who are eager to help turn the pages, they were very thick in the hardback copy we got. Seem like they would be really difficult to tear. It also tells a cute classic story about a caterpillar becoming a butterfly.

One of my all-time favorite children's books! Not only is the story just plain old cute, it also teaches days of the week, counting, basic life cycle of the butterfly, and is also good for helping children sequence events in a story. I also love Eric Carle's distinctive illustrations.
titles: We love The Very Hungry Caterpillar!

review_contents: when the description said this was the mini book, it wasn't kidding! This book is way too small to read to my baby...I am going to get the larger version instead because it's actually quite ridiculously small.

Definitely miniature...I am disappointed. I thought it was miniature in the sense of less pages, as in a abridged story, but wrong---be sure to have your glasses with you if your eyesight is a little weak.

Could be good for the car? I don't know but I am disappointed with its size and the price I paid for it.
I love this book! I actually purchased it to be used as a prop in a photo shoot, but it's a great addition to any children's library!

This is a childhood favorite of my son, my daughter, and now my granddaughter. I only wish that I could have found the original hard cover version. This board book is too small and the lettering too tiny. It was very disappointing when I got it. My granddaughter also was disappointed.
titles: A CHILDHOOD FAVORITE IN THE WRONG SIZE BOOK

review_contents: Love this book! The story and concept themselves are wonderful and the colors on the pages are fun and vibrant - great for kids. I bought this book for my nephew and the quality is really nice. Great purchase and I highly recommend this story for the kiddos. It's also fun to let them create their own artwork similar to Eric Carle if you're looking for a fun project!

I love this story and so don't both my kids. Only reason I gave it 4 stars cause because it's a very small copy for $6. Perfect size for my 7 month old, but way to small for my 4 yr old. Small book means very small words so think about that when going to purchase.

This was one of my kids (now teens) favorite books. I got it for a friend having her first baby. A must of all children collections. The board books are the best because they stand up (better) to toddler handling as they begin to read (or recite from memory) their favorites.
titles: This was one of my kids (now teens) favorite books. I got it for a friend having ...

review_contents: This book is a great book, and I bought it for my nephew's first birthday because I thought that I should share my love of reading with him at a young age. However, I'm incredibly disappointed with Amazon.com's shipping practices. I ordered this book on May 25th thinking that a week was enough time for it to ship for my nephew's party on June 2nd. However, it's been two days and the thing hasn't even left the Amazon warehouse yet! I'm ridiculously nervous that it won't get here in time. Very disappointed. I understand that the warehouse for Amazon is very large, but if this doesn't come in time, I'm going to be very distraught.
titles: Very disappointed with the shipping practices on this one.

review_contents: This book is a classic. I remember it when I was young so naturally I wanted my children to enjoy it as well. I love the illustrations and my daughter loves putting her fingers in the holes. It is a great book for interaction and discovery.
They aren't lying when they say 'miniature'. This thing is tiny. Maybe a little too small. Plus my daughter ate the pages. Otherwise a good 'simple' book.

Fun little book for my 3 year old granddaughter. She also enjoys the counting. The book is hardboard and there are little holes where in the middle and she loves to put her fingers in them and count. It's an interesting layout - not like other books your kids have with different size pages and the little holes.

I got this for a christmas present so I havent givin it to my child yet, but I ordered this because I learned out to read out of this and hoped this would help my youngest also learn how to read. This book was shipped with another item and they both were in great condition.

A great book for my little granddaughter, as well as for my kindergarten class. We were learning about the life cycle of a caterpillar/butterfly, and this book was perfect. We even acted it out a little, and the kids found that such fun! Great ideas on Pinterest to use with this book. I love Eric Carle's works!

Brought as a gift for my niece to read to her baby. This is had copy so the little could look at the pictures chew if he likes. Once parents & grandparents any adult should spend time reading to children. This makes them good readers and interested in books as they get older.
we love this book. Been using it to teach my son the days of the week. seems to be working- and it is great for easy counting too. a must have book for any kids library.

This is such a great book and so fun to read for both child and parent. No matter what time of day.
This is a classic book that you HAVE to have for any young child. Fun and captivating for all young children . My 14 year old still knows all the words by heart.
titles: This is such a great book

review_contents: My daughter and I love the Hungry Little Caterpillar so we made it her birthday party theme. I got 8 of these little books for the grab bags for the kids and they are perfect!! They are tiny enough to fit in the goodie bags but not too tiny for the little kids to read. So cute. Love them!

I'm a mother of 4 grown children, and have 6 grandchildren (so far), and loved this book from when I was very young. I'm so glad that The Very Hungry Caterpillar is still here as alive and hungry as ever to eat its way into the hearts of the rising generations.

All my boys loved it so much they literally wore it off. I got it three times! They loved to put their cute little fingers in each of the holes that the caterpillar ate through. Great for talking about colors, counting, nature, and good healthy food!
titles: All my four boys love this book

review_contents: The story of "The Very Hungry Caterpillar" is wonderful. I am only commenting on the size of the "miniature version". I knew it would be small, but it is too small. I would say the text is around 10pt font. Much too small for my young child to read.

My son loved it! Such a cute book. Book came just as described, great condition to me even though it said it was in "good" condition. The book jacket had a few spots that were dirty, but that was not an issue at all. The book itself was in great condition! Thanks again!

Bought this for my daugthers when they were very young and have started to buy it again for all the two to three year olds I know (so that their parents can read it to them) It's a great story and the colours(colors) are very vivid and engaging.

Cute little version for you and your children reading time! I bought this one for my daughter's baby shower,
a part of a nice gift basket I made for her. When she saw it she cried of emotion because I used to read the
same story to her when she was little and she loved it very much!

You can't get much better for a kid's book. It's cute, fun, adorable, great graphics... you can introduce colors, foods, counting... It's great for showing baby's spoken words and signed words, and a fun book for the kids to "read" (i.e. memorize and repeat) to you at a young age.
My daughter enjoys sticking her fingers in the caterpillar holes. Colorful and easy to turn pages. Just as I remember it...
I really liked this book in general - but the giant board book is excellent!
titles: Love how big this book is!

review_contents: The story is great, but I wish we saw the description where it says mini. It was our fault, but disappointing opening the package to find such a small book that a child will most likely destroy. Ended up reordering the same book but larger.
titles: Make sure you see that this is a mini book

review_contents: This is a great book. You can use it to teach numbers, colors, shapes, and food to your children. We don't always read the words in the book, sometimes we just point and name things we see. I worried the stylized pictures would confuse her but she was never confused by the artsy pictures.

Love love this book, it's such a classic book that you really can't go wrong buying it. My kids love to go through all the food items he eats and stick their fingers in the holes :) I loved this book as a kid myself so I knew they would too.

My grandchildren love this story! The larger format board book is very colorful and easy for little hands to manage. I found it a real bonus to hear the author, Eric Carle, read his own work and the kids can listen and read along.

I guess I didn't notice that this was the mini version of the book when I purchased it. They're not kidding when they say it's miniature. This thing is teeny, tiny. Smaller than a postcard. Pretty worthless for kids and babies, in my opinion. What possessed someone to make such a small book?!
titles: This is the smallest book ever

review_contents: Such beautiful art and fun design with half/fourth/sixth/eighth pages and holes to show the caterpillar eating through food. My three year old loves sticking her finger through, it teaches her to count and she learns about butterflies:)

The very Hungry Caterpillar is one of the best learning books for young children. They learn how to count, numbers, colors, fruit names, science concepts and most of all.... how a butterfly is formed.
I have used this book in my classroom for many years.
Thank you, Eric Carle

This is a must have baby and toddler book. If you don't have this for your child, buy it.
This version is a cute board book with different sized pages for the 5 fruits. My son loved this book starting around 9 months old and still loves it at 25 months old.
titles: Must have baby and toddler book

review_contents: I bought this as a gift and it's no exaggeration, it's tiny. It still is the classic Eric Carle story and illustrations, but if you're giving it to someone, I suggest buying the full-sized edition.

This is such a cute little version of the original. Great for traveling with kids! I loved this book when I was younger, and now I can enjoy it again with my daughter - in a smaller, (easier for her to focus on) version.

Cover was on upside down and backwards! The book was so tiny, need a magnifying glass to read it.
Since it was defective, I was able to return it but the size is a definite problem since the pictures are
so important.
titles: Miniscule book, cover on backwards/upside down

review_contents: A friend of mine in Blowing Rock, NC had this book and my son was always so fascinated by it. I ordered it and he has not put it down. It is a great board book made very sturdy and is so informative about counting AND nutrition. Very pleased that I finally ordered him his own copy.

This book is the perfect size for little kids. My daughter is almost two, and she can easily hold this book without it being "too big" for her to flip the pages herself. Some others said in their reviews they were not happy about the font size, I do not have an issue with the font size at all. I do not think it is too small to read easily. This is the perfect book for a toddler that likes to hold their books while you read to them. I also love the story, it was one of my favorite books as a child. I'm very pleased with this product, great price for this book!!!
titles: This book is the perfect size for little kids

review_contents: Ok so I got this for my 3 yrs old and yes i saw that it was a minutrue but I failed to see the actual dimension. So it was smaller than I was expecting. With that said. I still like the book. Easy to stuff in a bag and carried it along to keep him busy for a bit.

This is such a great book, and I love having it in board book form for my daughter, who is not yet very gentle with books. She loves the holes on the pages....stays mesmerized with those for quite awhile!

One of my 14 month old baby's favorite books. The favorite way of her reading it is to find the little caterpillar on different spots on different pages. It's also great to teach her different kinds of fruits and food, too. Highly recommend.
titles: One of my 14 month old baby's favorite books. The favorite way of her reading it ...

review_contents: I wanted to make sure to get a large enough copy so I made sure to check the measurements - this one was great! I love the finished product. Haven't used the cd and not sure if I will, but it might be nice to have.

This book was a favorite of mine as a child. I purchased it after buying the Insect Lore Original Butterfly Garden with Voucher, so my preschool-aged son could read about the caterpillar and see them grow. He now loves the book and remembers all the words. Always a favorite with kids!

SOOO cute...goes perfectly with the Hungry Caterpiller book...probably more for baby rather than toddler but can be used to accompany the story of the Hungry Caterpillar when read and experienced...good present
titles: Great accompaniment to the Hungry Caterpillar book

review_contents: My 1 year old is quite the bookworm and enjoys flipping the pages of this board book. She loves to try to stick her fingers in the holes in the book that the caterpillar ate through. =) Every child should have a copy of this book!

I'd never heard of this story before but bought this for my grandson. We LOVE this book. It is an adorable story but the book is short enough to hold his attention for the duration. He counts with it and loves the ending.
It was his mothers favorite - a wonderful gift for my great-grandson - timely delivery, too, thanks
My eleven week old loves this book. It is a very cute story with lovely illustrations. My son and I are huge Eric Carle fans. I highly recommend this book for any child's library, it's so much fun!

My son loves this book. After reading it he then relized that there is this on Netflix also so he watches that too. He loves to say he's hungry because of this book haha... good thing too cause this boy needs to eat!!! always running around, too skinny
titles: good thing too cause this boy needs to eat

review_contents: This mini book was a lot smaller than I expected, but good quality. The size is such that I can slip it into my handbag and have a book for the grand kids when we are out and they need something to keep them occupied.

I was thinking this was a great deal but was a little disappointed when it came and it was a tiny little book. I'm keeping it for a diaper bag book but buyer beware you're not getting the full size thing.
The Very Hungry Caterpillar The book arrived in new condition as stated by the seller.
I brought this to a book baby shower and it was very impressive due to its size. It has a convenient handle too of course the story and illustrations make this book a classic.

This book will help children understand the life and activities of some of the funny crawly creatures they see outdoors. The illustrations are good, but it's hard to get excited about them or about the text.
titles: good description of what caterpillars do

review_contents: Excellent book, brought on many memories from my own childhood. Eric Carle rocks and so do his books to this day. Educational story for the little ones, too - of course ending with the beautiful butterfly the little hungry caterpillar turns into after eating so much.

Nice story, nice illustrations.
The board book has little circles cut in the food items the caterpillar is going through, and my 9 mo son loves touching those cut-outs when I read this to him.

Eric Carle is always the best!!
The story is cute and it teach you the days,counts,foods..only one thing that could be better is the size, the board book is extremely little and my baby likes the big images .Otherwize it could have definitely 5 stars .

Got this for a baby shower and it's a personal childhood favorite. I thought it was going to be the full size hardback which apparently they don't print anymore but this size is perfect for a diaper bag or an "on the go" mom & child.
I'm not happy with this book. Why? Because the book looks used and worn out and it's suppose to be new.
This book is a joy to read for me and my little one. It also is one that can be read for quite a while to reinforce counting concepts, objects, days of the week and food that is good for you.

Without giving thoughts into it I bought hard cover version of this book... regret it since my baby tore it apart in a month. I would suggest get a board book for 2 years and younger. I bought it when she was 6 months...
titles: Without giving thoughts into it I bought hard cover version ...

review_contents:
We received this book in the mail, it can fit in the size of your palm.
I was very disappointed. I would not recommend this book to anyone.
You need a magnifying glass to read it. I felt VERY DECIEVED.
I bought this book for my 14 month old and she loves to have me read her this book. Thanks for the fast delivery.
This is a fun read, short and beautifully illustrated. A wonderful addition to any child's library.
titles: Classic story. Must buy for collection.

review_contents: I had no idea this book and the font would be soo small. It was a fun ready for my little son but since he wears glasses that font size has been a bit of a challenge. I would ensure a large print for anyone willing to purchase this book.

You can't go wrong with this book. Kids love it from the start. My grandson repeatedly goes back to Saturday, the page with all the different foods the caterpillar eats that day. He learned different kinds of foods quickly and loves to point them out.

I ordered this book as a hardcover in hopes of using it for reading time at my Baby ASL class. I was super excited...but to only find out when it arrived it's only about 4x3 inches big. WHAT. Not what I was expecting...I understand I didn't order the Board Book but I was not expecting the hardback to be that small. Not cool guys...not cool.
This is a beautifully illustrated story about a caterpillar that turns into a beautiful butterfly. It is a wonderful gift for expectant mothers-to-be.

Bought this for an International school overseas to help teach English to elementary school kids. The Kids and Teachers love it. The giant size edition allows the teacher to hold it up and the whole class to see.

My 2yr old son loves it. Its a beautiful board book- child can learn numbers, colors, days of the week and fruits all in one little book,]Please read the dimensions before buying because paper back is much smaller size.
titles: Its a beautiful board book- child can learn numbers

review_contents: I bought two cloth panels showing the caterpillar and the butterfly, then had to buy the book to see how the transition was done. I made a two-sided baby quilt with a stem and cocoon connecting them.
titles: Still popular after all these years

review_contents: I used to read this to my sons when they were little. Now I am in charge of the parenting center at the Rockville Correctional Facility and wanted it on hand for incarcerated Moms to read to their visiting children. If possible I would like to know where I may get books in bulk for low shipping rates, as these come out of my pocket.

I read it to my grandson(4 yrs. old) He loved the whole book. Here again the pictures were hiliarious. Recommend highly for anyone for a child to read or to be read to. There was something at the end to be learned.

Good for tiny fingers, but it wasn't clear in the description that it is a "mini" size book. I still want to find the larger size in hardback.
BUT the story will always be in the top 100 of preschoolers' books.
I buy this book for all of my friends with kids and they all love it!

This book has stood the test of time. So many lessons to the story. Good quality construction. Baby can handle it and like most even chew on the corners! Wonderful first book they can actually handle!
Simply adorable. The book teaches the stages of life for a caterpillar, the days of the week, different foods, what over eating causes - fat, and the final stage of becoming a butterfly.

I love Eric Carle books--this story is my favorite. I purchased this book for my newborn niece. I'm pretty confident that she will enjoy the book as have so many other young children before her. The price was also much better than the bricks and mortar stores.
titles: I love Eric Carle books--this story is my favorite

review_contents: This is the same cute little book I remember from grade school. My son is on 6 months old but I like reading it to him and he likes chewing on the book.

Beautiful book at a great price! This one is very nicely done for an infant and toddler. And for my 7 yr old granddaughter who loves to read to her baby brother! Hopefully, she will instill her love of reading in him naturally like we all did with her!

great book! my granddaughter loves it even though we cant make it through the whole book yet before she runs away with it. She loves the pictures and the pages. I love that it is sturdy and small enough to fit in her little hands.
Good story, wish it was a bit cheaper than what I ended up paying for it. The flip pages are a little difficult the first few readings but it worked out in the end

A classic. Have bought this book for each of my kids and they have each loved it. My daughter hasnt read this one yet as her brothers have misplaced their copies, but she loves the illustrations in Eric Carle books and will be sure to love this story!
titles: Have bought this book for each of my kids and they have each loved it. My daughter hasnt read this one yet ...

review_contents: This book actually my son, who is 4, read it at school. He loved so much that he kept on reciting the whole story over and over. Nice work.

Eric Carle's classic that stands the test of time! My girls who are 25 & 27 loved this book when they were little. I bought this for my new (and only) grandchild...she will enjoy it too! You won't be disappointed with this purchase!

I am a huge Eric Carle fan. As a teacher of little ones, his stories often teach lessons with beautifully made pictures and eloquently told tales. Any Eric Carle fan needs this book in their collection!

First bought this book over 40 years ago and will continue to buy it whilever there are young children in my life. Good for learning to read and count and understanding of how a caterpillar becomes a butterfly.

I bought this for my nephew when he was born. If you don't own this book or have never heard of it, purchase it now! Such a great classic! I ordered this through Prime and it came within two days, as promised.

Got a few copies of this for my nieces and nephews to go along with the plush caterpillars I got for them. A few of them already had the book but this board book is a great size and very durable. 5 stars.
This is another of those books young children love. If you're looking for a gift to give to a new young mother, why not choose this one and Good Night, Moon? Both are perfect choices.
titles: A very good choice for the very young

review_contents: We haul this little book around everywhere. I read it in public places at the park, the coffee shop, etc. I just throw it in the diaper bag. Great colors and it keep my babies attention plus it's a great traditional story
As a child I loved this book and now I get to read it to my daughter. I purchase the board book so she can handle it herself and I don't have to worry about her ruining it. Well worth it.
Delightful story, beautiful art, clever little "bite" holes in the pages, and even a gentle lesson about caterpillars and butterflies. Lovely.

Just know when they say miniature, it is TINY!!! I thought a smaller book would be perfect for little hands, but this is a micro book!
All in all, a good book, good quality, and will definitely fit in any purse.
titles: I thought a smaller book would be perfect for little hands

review_contents: Timeless classic! I bought this thick cardboard pages and it's holding up great with my 2 year old nephew. The caterpillar eats his way through the pages which is super fun and helps keep little minds focused on the book during story-time.
titles: I bought this thick cardboard pages and it's holding up great with my 2 year old nephew

review_contents: My three year old loves this book. He always wants me or the wife to read it to him. It's also good for early education as it describes the story of the transformation of a caterpillar to butterfly.

This is a very lovely story that allows your little one to count and identify the foods that the "hungry caterpillar" devours.

My daughter loves the book and I love it as well.

The book was perfect. I was originally going to buy the big hardcover book but I'm glad I went back and ordered the giant board book instead. Besides the fact that the board book was $33 cheaper, it is def easier to maintain than the hardcover.

I used it for story time at my sons first bday party (Very Hungry Caterpillar theme) and it is the perfect size to standup on my lap and for all the kids to see the pictures. Also it comes with a mini stuffed caterpillar that my son loves to play with.

Great buy!
titles: Giant board book edition- perfect for any at home library

review_contents: I was so excited to buy this book for my daughter since my kindergarten teacher used to read it to my class when I was little! I was disappointed by how small the book was though. Maybe 5 in. x 4 in.? I should have looked at the dimensions before buying it but I would have been happier if it was larger!

This is a great book! Helps with counting and introduces kids to healthy snacks (fruit). (Kids don't seem to mind that it's a bug modeling the eating habits for them). It also introduces kids to metamorphosis. Covers lots of bases and is entertaining.
This book was not what I expected from the description. price is much to high for type of book received, there have to be better choices for this wonderful, classic story.

And so does our 4 month old. The colours are bright and the pictures are simple. Plus the pages are nice and thick being a board book so he can try and hold onto it (and maybe chew it!) while we read.
A child's classic. Both of our children loved the book. I purchased as a baby gift. Every child needs a copy of The Very Hungry Caterpillar. Beautifully illustrated, clever story.

Nice book for learning to count to 5 (doesn't have numbers). It has pictures of various food items with holes in them which were left by caterpillar from one apple to two pears and .....5 oranges or something like that.
If you're looking for a small book that you can take with you when you're out and about, this is perfect! It fits right in the pocket of the diaper bag. Plus, this book is awesome.
titles: Miniature is perfect for carrying in the diaper bag

review_contents: As other reviewers already had mentioned the book is small (mini), and the writing can be a little difficult to read for some people. On the other hand, you can easily carry this book in your purse and have it ready when you are out, and need to distract your child.
This is a great story and a cute little book. So cute that my eldest daughter insisted we do her baby sister's 1st party with the theme. It's a perfect theme for a 1 year old.
How do people give this book a bad review? The Very Hungry Caterpillar is a classic. This little board book is going to last for years and I can't wait to read it to my little one.

This book is just how I remembered from a long time ago in my childhood. We just bought it for our son. Make sure you check out the dimensions of the book, because it is small. That's my fault for not checking that before purchasing.
titles: This book is just how I remembered from a long ...

review_contents: We love this story, but this board book is very awkward. It is extremely hard for little hands to hold and turn the pages. Great story, but maybe get the paperback version instead.
titles: LOVE THE BOOK - but not the size/shape

review_contents: Great classic story. Teaches counting, days of the week, names of fruit, metamorphosis of butterflies, and the consequences of over eating. Great book and the literal holes in the pages are fun. The best Eric Carle book in my opinion.

My son loves this book. I vaguely remembered the book from my childhood but re-reading it made me realize what a nice story this is when being first introduced to books.

A must have for a toddlers blossoming book collection.

This is a classic. I ordered the hard version of it to give as a gift for a friend's baby shower. The book itself was a little warped, not completely flat like I would expect. But, it's still a great story and a great book!
I think all children should have this book. My three month old baby loves me reading this book to her. She seems to love the color and of course my sounds affects reading this book to her.
I owned these books for my first kiddo, reused for my second kiddo, and have now purchased as a gift for a good friend's kiddo. I think that says enough on how children enjoy these.

My daughter loves it! Can teach numbers, fruits, and foods easily. She loves pointing and repeating names of the foods and identifies them she sees them on our table or when we're eating out. She's now 18 months and we probably started with this book when she was a little over a year old.
titles: and foods easily. She loves pointing and repeating names of the ...

names: Amazon Customer for a really long time
review_contents: I like this book because its something i can remember reading as a child myself & a story that seems to be a common story read to many. It portrays the process of Metamorphism quite well.
titles: A classic story that portrays the process Metamorphism quite well!

review_contents: I bought this in the boardbook style as a gift for a one-year old. Perfect for the little ones to have read to them and for them to pretend to "read" to themselves.

Childrens classic that is wonderful for boys and girls alike. I read this to my son over and over. He learned to count and said some of his first words with this book. The very hungry caterpillar will forever be one of my favorites.
titles: A must have for new parents

review_contents: You can't go wrong with this book. The item is sturdy and the story is so much fun. Kids will love this! I remember reading this back when it came out when I was in elementary school and my class always loved it. A classic.
This smaller board book is great for the smaller hands. The story line can be used to teach several topics such as science, counting, sequence. My students loved this book.

Very disappointed that it was such a tiny book. I had hoped to use it in my High School class I teach, when we have preschool.
Shipping was good.
Classic book. Love it in the boardbook, but the CD with Eric Carle isn't that impressive. Still 5 stars!
Very very cute book for children. I like giving my grandchildren and great grandchildren books for special occasions. They love reading them and being read to.
This TINY little book is a classic, of course. My kids love reading it and now that they are starting to read on their own, it's a favorite.

What an interesting topic,great colorful illustrations, and a darling
caterpillar to take a child thru this adventure. A great learning
tool and just fun to look thru, and talk about with your child.

I had never read this story, but saw a YouTube puppet show and we even bought a Hungry Caterpillar toy that my oldest chose for his baby sister. So now for my 3rd baby, I bought it for him and for my friend's first baby. Happy story. We love it!
I like this book because not only does it teach the life cycle of the butterfly/caterpillar but it teaches healthy choices and fruits and vegetables and time as the week passes.
I guess I could have read the description closer but the mini part really does mean mini. That's good or bad depending on your needs. Other than that the art is the same as other editions.

I love this story but I totally missed the part about this being the miniature version, I picked it over the paper back because it was hard cover so I'm a little disappointed. On the plus side, it won't take up much space in the diaper bag and will be good on the go.
titles: I love this story but I should have realized it was the miniature version..

review_contents: This is a classic story for kids! Definitely a must have. We even did both our kids first birthday party's in this theme serving the food the caterpillar eats. It was a lot of fun!

I love everything of Eric Carle's. I didn't get a great book from the company that I had gotten it sent from. But the book itself is a wonderful book. I loved it as a child and hopefully my baby will like it too.
titles: I love everything of Eric Carle's

review_contents: My younger nephew loved the colors in this book and the story was easy to remember. I loved this book when I was little, too.

titles: A favorite from my childhood is now a favorite for my ...

review_contents: Great book for teaching numbers and how a caterpillar turns into a butterfly. One of the children's favorites when I was teaching preschool. Adding to my grandson's collection of books
MY KIDS HAD THIS BOOK WHEN THEY WERE SMALL. THEY ENJOYED IT SO MUCH. IT WAS ONE OF THEIR FAVORITES. SO NOW I GOT IT FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER AND SHE SEEMS TO LOVE IT TOO.
titles: EVERY KID SHOULD OWN THIS BOOK

review_contents:
Yeah.. so.. I purchased this book without properly reading the description. It's a miniature edition. Which is fine. I just wouldn't have purchased had I read that.
Cute, TINY version of the book.
We absolutely love this book! The pictures are beautiful and it's really easy to understand for the kids. We read this book very often and my kids love those little holes... :)

This book was a gift sent anonymously to a child living in a shelter. She had this book on her list. My children enjoyed this story tremendously and, when I would read it in their classroom, the kids loved acting out the story. I hope the book brought her much happiness.

Very small (it REALLY is miniature) but I was pleasantly surprised to find that all the pages are inside including the different-length ones where the caterpillar eats progressively more food each progressive day.

I purchased a group of board books for a baby shower gift and wrapped them together in a cute receiving blanket. They were a hit. I of course read each book when they arrived and was very satisfied with this selection.

review_contents: I loved this book as a child, definitely a classic that needs to be passed down generations. Added this one to the home library!

review_contents:
I wanted the version that had more sparkle and shiny foil and was a tad bit bigger.
But, this smaller version did not disappoint.
Great story, illustration.
My son still loves it.

This book is known amongst Mom's and Dad's as a child's favorite. You have to have this in your child's library of great books.
Both babies and little kids love this little book.
titles: One of the best books out there!

review_contents: This story follows the development and growth of a caterpillar. Each page is colorful and interesting as the story unfolds to the surprise at the end.

review_contents: I remember loving this book as a kid so I got it for my infant son. Unfortunately I didn't notice the size of the board book (5x7in) before purchasing it. It is very small but I guess it's OK for the price.
Read this book over & over...too cute! Perfect for babies & toddlers...very sturdy board book. Arrived in timely manner and in great condition.
My grandson loves the book. He is approaching terrible twos so he can put things to the test...The book will survive and he really likes the pictures which help tell the story..
This has rapidly become my grandson's very favorite book. He just loves saying "but he's still hungry!" He picks out this book to be read first before bedtime or nap time.
Packed well, came 2 days early! Eric Carle is one of my Granddaughter's very favorite author's!! He is wonderful! The book can really withstand an 18 month old and a 2 year old!
This is one of my daughters favorite, it helps with colors, numbers, and days of the week. It's good to read to your kids as often as you can and this book will help interest them.

Well deserves the status of 'classic'
Also recommend buying The Very Hungry Caterpillar LACING CARDS as a companion to the book
Developmentally great - counting, colors, big v small, eating healthy, and lacing skills

review_contents: My son loves everything from The Hungry Caterpillar. He loves this board book! It's a miniature, short version of the classic book. It's a great gift to give anyone with a child under 5. I love that it teaches about food.

This is a great book for learning the cycle of the caterpillar. I follow up with growing caterpillars, and watching them turn into butterflies. Book arrived in a timely manner, and wrapped perfectly to avoid wrinkling.
I love this story, and how it teaches children to count, and the fact that it is tiny is wonderful cause you can shove it in the diaper bag and go! It is like the size of an index card. Perfect!

I thought it was like the original book and was a larger one but it was smaller than my hand so when I received it in the mail, I wasn't as excited for my daughter to read it because the words were so small, no one could really see it. Just not what I was hoping for after all these years for my daughter to read.
titles: I thought it was like the original book and was a larger one but ...

review_contents: This has always been a favorite of mine and now my 18 month old daughter. She's really hard on her board books but this is great quality and still looks great after lots of abuse :)

The little boy who received this book loved it so much. It took a couple of weeks for it to arrive from the time I ordered it, but the child didn't know any better. he was happy. I am too. The seller was gracious-bookseller72135-and e-mailed me about the shipping time right after I ordered. All in all happy people every where.
I am very disappointed! I made sure I did not buy a cardboard book. I am trying to replace a library book that was damaged and I needed it full size. This book is about 3" high and 4" wide.

This is not a review for the book but rather the condition it was in. I was going to buy this in stores but it has bumped edges and looked like it had been picked up a lot so I figured offline would be more new looking. Nope! Edges torn and dents all in it. Not happy with that at all.
This is a nice book for toddlers, my son is two and loves looking at books. I like that this book is a board book, so he can easily hold it and it won't be easy to tear.

I was raised with this book, and now my daughter has her very own copy! At first I thought "It's not very colorful, I wonder if she will even notice" but she took to it immediately and runs around with it yelling "boo boo" because she can't say book. Would recommend.

Kids love the book so much they try to eat it!
Seriously, it is done very tastefully, real hard cover, the holes the caterpillar made in the fruit are funny, and the colors are great.

I recommend the full size version, and if you are looking for a smaller version try the board book. This miniature version was so small that the writing was almost difficult to read and the book was hard to hold even for young ones. While I knew the book was going to be small, I was expecting to need a magnifying glass to read it.
titles: Get out your magnifying glass... buy the board book or full size instead.

review_contents: Pages are thick paperboard with holes to signify the catapiller eating. Tactile experience for even those too young to read. Also, very colorful.
This is such a cute little book and I am so happy we added it to our little boys collection. I loved it when I was growing up and I hope he will too.
Loved this story from childhood. It's timeless and a lively story for your children. The board book is a bit more interactive for children compared to the paperback - has cutouts, etc.
Everyone needs to have this book in a children's library. The artwork is beautiful and the story is a good read at any young age, and not too long
Perfect book for all ages and the boardbook is great for infant and toddlers as well. Great story, colorful and beautiful classic illustrations.

review_contents: A great book! It is a fun read. Teaches counting, stages of caterpillar to butterfly, and names of foods. It is even more enjoyable for the child that likes bugs or butterflies.

review_contents: I ACTUALLY GOT THIS FOR MY 23 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER. THIS WAS HER FAVORITE BOOK AS A CHILD & SHE ALWAYS WANTED ONE! SHE WAS VERY HAPPY & SHOCKED THAT I GOT HER ONE WITH THE CATERPILLAR ALSO

My son loves to turn the pages with the holes in them (with the hole itself) and it is so sturdy that it has held up fabulously. Something about the collage art, the smaller pages, and the colors drew my one-year old into this book more than any other book (except a few that rhyme).
This story is fun for children and there are all kinds of accompanying products to be able to supplement the award winning book! Definitely recommended!
my kids love this book. I bought this one for my sister's baby shower. this one is the 5 x 7ish size board book.

I ordered this book and paid $9.99 for the book and $8.99 for s&h. I got the book and it was a miniature book and on the back cover it stated $4.99. I feel like I got totally duped! When I complained to the company (not Amazon but a company that was selling on Amazon), they offered to take the book and refund me a little over $3.00 after s&h and return fees. If it had stated this was a miniature of the real size book I would not have bought it.
My son loved this book and now my daughter is enjoying it. She loves to read it so much I have to hid it once and a while to give myself a break.
This is the classic book in a hard cover/pages format. It is the perfect size for my toddler to hold and look through without tearing pages. She really enjoys the artwork in the book.
My toddler loved having the little edition to bring around with her everywhere since the real version is big and heavy. The pages are all paper, but in the same fashion as the big book.
I didn't realize how small it was but its perfect for the little kid hands. My daughter loves it and remembers the story so she can read it to us :)

review_contents: I thought I was ordering a "hardcover" book of the Very Hungry Caterpillar along with a caterpillar toy. What arrived was a little BOARD book (Yes it is hard but different to me than hardcover book.) and a tiny hungry caterpillar. Knowing what the traditional, original hardcover book size is (11 1/2 x 8 inches), I thought that is what I was ordering. Pictures don't tell you the true size unless you have something next to it that you know the true size of that object. Therefore, I thought the caterpillar would be bigger. I hesitate to rate this item low because it is fine for what it is but not fine for what I thought I was ordering. For the amount I paid ($20.65) you would think it was the bigger book not the tiny (7x5) board book that I received. The video that was included in the product description shows Eric Carle with the size of book in his hands that I thought I was ordering. I should have been more careful because in the description it does say "sturdy board book edition" but in the title it says "hardcover." I also should have read the reviews because they all said what arrived were smaller than expected.
